messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

notification sent with wrong actual elapsed percentage sent friday incident warning for hi guys please log ticket investigate why below notification was sent with since elapsed percentage was thank you manager sent incident warning for ticket close breaching please be advised following ticket close breaching reference number customer summary technical failure alarm priority high resolution target date assigned engineer
